thread.title: Facebook makes search function more powerful
thread.title_full: Facebook makes search function more powerful

title: Facebook makes search function more powerful
text:
Facebook makes search function more powerful 
The News Friday 23rd October, 2015 
Facebook on Thursday announced that it is making its search function a lot more powerful to make it possible for users to search all 2 trillion posts on any topic. The new improved feature is expected to make the process of finding real-time information and relevant conversations easier. For example, if a term like "Pakistan" or "World T20" is searched, a list of suggested groups, Pages, or events would not appear. Instead, the user would be directed to a personalized and more targeted feed with relevant posts not only from the user's friends but from strangers as well....
